title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire Fully Contained - #JeffersonFire 06/18/2022 INC#1273

item.description: Update Fully Contained - #JeffersonFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1273; 06:30PM; 13600 W Culver Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tM1Jh0; PlayaDelRey; 86 LAFD ground and air responders, assisted by LACoFD and Culver City FD ground crews in Automatic Aid, have fully contained the perimeter of the blaze at three and one-half (3.5) acres of vegetation in less than one hour. No injury. No structures damaged. NOTE: One or more lanes of Culver Boulevard and Jefferson Boulevard west of Lincoln Boulevard will remain closed until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists should expect ongoing congestion and delay, avoid the area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Though the genesis of the fire appears related to a full-sized sport utility vehicle that was well involved with fire, with flame fanned by light on-shore wind already spread into nearby volatile vegetation on LAFD arrival, the specific and official cause of the fire has yet to be determined.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM42 E205 E263 E290 E293 E294 E295 E43 E5 E51 E59 E61 E62 E63 E64 E69 E90 E95 EM9 H2 H3 H4 H5 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA62 T5 T63 T90 T93 T94 T95 + LACoFD + CCFD; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire #JeffersonFire 06/18/2022 INC#1273

item.description: Update #JeffersonFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1273; 06:10PM; 13600 W Culver Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tM1Jh0; #PlayaDelRey; The 86 LAFD responders assigned by ground and air (Joined by nearby LACoFD and Culver City FD ground crews in Automatic Aid) are making significant progress on the blaze, known as the "Jefferson Fire", which has consumed 3 and one-half (3.5) acres of vegetation, and is now holding at 'Major Emergency' status. No injury. No structure threat. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes of Culver Boulevard and Jefferson Boulevard west of Lincoln Boulevard will continue until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM42 E205 E263 E290 E293 E295 E43 E5 E51 E59 E61 E62 E63 E64 E69 E90 E95 EM9 H2 H3 H4 H5 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA62 T5 T63 T90 T93 T95 + LACoFD and CCFD; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1273; 05:34PM; 13600 W Culver Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tM1Jh0; #PlayaDelRey; LAFD ground and air response with nearby LACoFD in Automatic Aid, to one-quarter (0.25) acre light grass burning in the Ballona Creek Wetlands. No structure threat; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM42 E205 E263 E290 E295 E5 E51 E62 E63 E90 E95 EM9 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 RA62 T5 T63 T90 T95 + LACoFD Q110; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Century City Smoke Advisory; 04:30PM; West Olympic Blvd & Century Park East; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bctngX; #CenturyCity; Thick black smoke seen periodically this afternoon near the intersection of West Olympic Boulevard and Century Park East is the result of active utility work in the area. There is no fire, and no need to call 9-1-1.; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #SanteeFire 06/18/2022 INC#0734

item.description: Update #SanteeFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0734; 12:45PM; 1335 S Santee St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HCP3Pa; #Downtown; Address confirmed to be 1335 South Santee Street. Business involved is confirmed to be a (yet to be identified) restaurant. The civilian bystander with breathing difficulty was not transported to the hospital. Fire cause remains under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E266 E4 E5 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA17 RA810 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T20 T3 T66 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14 16; Brian Humphrey

#Knockdown - #SanteeFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0734; 12:30PM; 1335 S Santee St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HCP3Pa; #Downtown; Address Remains Tentative. 76 Firefighters took just 22 minutes in well-coordinated offensive firefighting operations to access, confine and fully extinguish well entrenched flames within one unit in a row of one-story businesses. One civilian bystander is being medically evaluated for breathing difficulties. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E266 E4 E5 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA17 RA810 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T20 T3 T66 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14 16; Brian Humphrey
